notes.text:
This update for libssh fixes the following issues: 

- CVE-2016-0739: Fix Weakness in diffie-hellman secret key generation. (bsc#965875)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: libssh before 0.7.3 improperly truncates ephemeral secrets generated for the (1) diffie-hellman-group1 and (2) diffie-hellman-group14 key exchange methods to 128 bits, which makes it easier for man-in-the-middle attackers to decrypt or intercept SSH sessions via unspecified vectors, aka a "bits/bytes confusion bug."
notes.title: Vulnerability description
